subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Lynch, a running back, violated the N.F.L.'s policy for dealing with the news media. The N.F.L. is also collecting a $50,000 fine that was imposed on Lynch for violations last season.
snippet: Lynch, a running back, violated the N.F.L.'s policy for dealing with the news media. The N.F.L. is also collecting a $50,000 fine that was imposed on Lynch for violations last season.
